<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106088</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106088</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206731</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Religion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Religion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Religion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Religião</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Religione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θρησκεία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Religión</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">offers 40 publications written in the 19th century America related to religion -- prayer books, sermons, hymnals, histories, moral instruction, writings about faith and science, missionary evangelism, and more.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Angebote 40 Publikationen, die in das 19. 
Jahrhundert Amerika geschrieben wurden, standen auf Religion -- 
Gebetbücher, Predigten, hymnals, Geschichten, moralische Anweisung, 
Schreiben über Glauben und Wissenschaft, Missionarsevangelism und 
mehr in Verbindung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les offres 40 publications écrites au 19ème 
siècle Amérique ont associé à la religion -- livres de prière, 
sermons, hymnals, histoires, instruction morale, écritures au sujet 
de la foi et de la science, évangélisation de missionnaire, et plus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">as ofertas 40 publicações escritas no 1ø 
século América relacionaram-se à religião -- livros do prayer, 
sermons, hymnals, histories, instrução moral, escritas sobre a fé e
a ciência, evangelism do missionário, e mais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">le offerte 40 pubblicazioni scritte nel 
diciannovesimo secolo America si sono riferite alla religione -- libri
di preghiera, sermons, hymnals, dati storici, istruzione morale, 
scritture circa fede e la scienza, evangelism di missionario e più.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προσφέρει 40 δημοσιεύσεις που γράφονται στο 19$ο 
αιώνα Αμερική αφορούσε τη θρησκεία -- βιβλία προσευχής, 
κηρύγματα, υμνολόγια, ιστορίες, ηθική αγωγή, γραφές για την 
πίστη και την επιστήμη, τον ιεραποστολικό εκχριστιανισμό, και 
περισσότερους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">las ofertas 40 publicaciones escritas en el 
diecinueveavo siglo América se relacionaron con la religión -- 
libros del rezo, sermones, hymnals, historias, instrucción moral, 
escrituras sobre la fe y la ciencia, evangelism del misionario, y 
más.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206731</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106088</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/religion</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
